Greeting.1: Oh... it's you. Let's just get this over with.
Greeting.2: I guess anyone nowadays thinks they can just walk in and talk to me.
Greeting.4: It is good to see you.
Greeting.5: My friend, it is so good to see you. I hope you have been doing well.

Farewell.4: I hope to see you again soon.
Farewell.5: Feel free to come talk to me anytime.

Ask_Name.3: May I ask what your name is?
Ask_Name.4: May I ask what your name is?
Ask_Name.5: May I ask what your name is?

Tell Name.3: I go by Shango. It's nice to meet you.
Tell Name.4: I go by Shango. It's nice to meet you.
Tell Name.5: I go by Shango. It's nice to meet you.

Tell Origin.1: I will leave that to your imagination.
Tell Origin.3: I come from a place that you won't find on any map. I came to this land in order to fufill my destiny.
Tell Origin.4: I come from a place that you won't find on any map. I came to this land in order to fufill my destiny.
Tell Origin.5: I come from a place that you won't find on any map. I came to this land in order to fufill my destiny.

Ask About Strength Of.2: What can you tell me about the strength of HERO
Ask About Strength Of.3: What do you know of the strength possesed by HERO
Ask About Strength Of.4: What do you know of the strength possesed by HERO
Ask About Strength Of.5: What do you know of the strength possesed by HERO

Tell About Strength Of.1: HERO is a weakling that has no ability to defend themself or others.
Tell About Strength Of.2: HERO is a weak person that can barely defend themself.
Tell About Strength Of.3: HERO is a capable person who can defend themself and their people.
Tell About Strength Of.4: HERO is a great individual with vast strength.
Tell About Strength Of.5: HERO has enough strength to take down anyone, or to protect anybody.

Ask About Affinity Of.3: How much of an agreeable person is HERO
Ask About Affinity Of.4: How much of an agreeable person is HERO
Ask About Affinity Of.5: How much of an agreeable person is HERO

Tell About Affinity Of.1: HERO is that horrible person that is always up to no good.
Tell About Affinity Of.2: HERO is someone that has made too many enemies for themself.
Tell About Affinity Of.3: HERO is a person that is likable enough.
Tell About Affinity Of.4: HERO is someone that a multitude of people think well of. Myself included.
Tell About Affinity Of.5: HERO is someone that a multitude of people think well of. Myself included.

Ask About Notoriety Of.2: What level of renown has been achieved by HERO
Ask About Notoriety Of.3: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO
Ask About Notoriety Of.4: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO
Ask About Notoriety Of.5: I am interested in people who have made names for themselves. How well do people know HERO

Tell About Notoriety Of.1: HERO is a nobody with very few accomplishments.
Tell About Notoriety Of.2: HERO is an individual of little importance with only a few minor accomplishments.
Tell About Notoriety Of.3: HERO is known as a capable person that has earned the favor of some.
Tell About Notoriety Of.4: HERO is known as a champion of the people and as a person of great strength and fortitude.
Tell About Notoriety Of.5: HERO is known far and wide as a hero amongst heroes and many people sing of their achievements.

Ask_To_Form_Alliance.1: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.2: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.3: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.4: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.5: How do you feel about forming and Alliance with me?

Accept Alliance Offer.1: I honestly do not see how allying with you will help this village become any safer.
Accept Alliance Offer.2: I do not know you that well, but this one time I will go against my better judgement and accept this alliance with you.
Accept Alliance Offer.3: I think that forming an alliance with you is a situation that benefits the both of us. I accept.
Accept Alliance Offer.4: I am more than happy to ally with you. I know that you will help make this village safer.
Accept Alliance Offer.5: I am more than happy to ally with you. I know that you will help make this village safer.

Confirm Alliance.1: Let's get this paperwork out of the way then. Glad to have you aboard.
Confirm Alliance.2: Let's get this paperwork out of the way then. Glad to have you aboard.
Confirm Alliance.3: Let's get this paperwork out of the way then. Glad to have you aboard.
Confirm Alliance.4: Let's get this paperwork out of the way then. Glad to have you aboard.
Confirm Alliance.5: Let's get this paperwork out of the way then. Glad to have you aboard.

Confirm Ally.1: I wish you would trust me, but I guess it cannot be helped.
Confirm Ally.2: I wish you would trust me, but I guess it cannot be helped.
Confirm Ally.3: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Ally.4: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Ally.5: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.

Confirm Fight.1: I wish you would trust me, but I guess it cannot be helped.

Confirm Fight.3: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Fight.4: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Fight.5: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.

Confirm Conquer.1: I wish you would trust me, but I guess it cannot be helped.

Confirm Conquer.4: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Conquer.5: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.

Confirm Peace.1: I wish you would trust me, but I guess it cannot be helped.

Confirm Peace.4: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.
Confirm Peace.5: I assure you that you will be glad that you took my advice.

Advise To Conquer.1: I would like you to consider conquering HERO
Advise To Conquer.2: I think it would be greatly beneficial to you if you gained control over HERO
Advise To Conquer.3: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO
Advise To Conquer.4: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO
Advise To Conquer.5: My friend, I believe now would be a perfect opportunity to conquer HERO

Take Advice To Conquer.1: HERO hmm.I was considering conquering them but then you told me it was a good idea. Now I am not so sure.
Take Advice To Conquer.2: HERO? Really? I don't feel like you should be giving me advice on such an important matter.
Take Advice To Conquer.3: HERO eh.I am not sure that conquest is the best idea for ensuring the safety of this village, but I will keep it in mind.
Take Advice To Conquer.4: HERO as a conquering target? I think that moving to conquer is a risky move, but I am glad that you gave me this advice.
Take Advice To Conquer.5: HERO hmm. I respect your advice, and will definitely consider conquest as a powerful strategic move.

Advise To Ally With.1: I believe it would be beneficial to you if you ally with HERO
Advise To Ally With.2: I feel like you would be a perfect candidate for an alliance with HERO
Advise To Ally With.3: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO
Advise To Ally With.4: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO
Advise To Ally With.5: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO

Take Advice To Ally With.1: HERO!? I absolutely refuse. The very idea of being in an alliance with their village disgusts me.
Take Advice To Ally With.2: HERO as an ally? An alliance can possibly help ensure the safety of this village, so I will definitely consider it.
Take Advice To Ally With.3: HERO as an ally? I will have to think deeply as to whether or not an alliance with them would be a good idea.
Take Advice To Ally With.4: HERO as an ally? Your advice always has my best interests in mind it seems, so I promise you I will deeply consider an alliance with them.
Take Advice To Ally With.5: HERO as an ally? Your advice always has my best interests in mind it seems, so I promise you I will deeply consider an alliance with them.

Advise To Revolt Against.1: I think it would be in your best interests to revolt against HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.2: I cannot stand see you under the oppression of another. You must break free of HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.3: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.4: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.5: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO

Take Advice To Revolt Against.1: HERO has gone too far, but do you honestly think I would take advice on such an important matter from someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.2: HERO has gone too far, I do not think I should be discussing this with someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.3: HERO is not very tolerant and it seems very risky to even be talking about this, but I cannot say that I haven't considered revolt.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.4: HERO being gone would help this village prosper, but it just seems so dangerous. I will have to think about this.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.5: HERO will control my people no further! I know you are right. This tyranny can last no longer. The only possible solution I can think of is revolt.

Advise To Destroy.1: I feel like it would most certainly be in your best interests to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.2: I feel like it is a good idea for you to destroy nuisances like HERO
Advise To Destroy.3: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.4: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.5: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO

Take Advice To Destroy.1: HERO!? You are suggesting I destroy them!? It is possible that this village would be safer if that village was out of the picture entirely. But I know that it is risky.
Take Advice To Destroy.2: HERO is not someone that will be easy to get rid of, but I am not someone to back down from a challenge if the safety of this village is on the line.
Take Advice To Destroy.3: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.
Take Advice To Destroy.4: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.
Take Advice To Destroy.5: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.

Ask_To_Duel.1: I am looking for an easy fight to loosen up a bit. I suppose you will do.
Ask_To_Duel.2: Duel me. I doubt someone of your caliber could even keep up.
Ask_To_Duel.3: I challenge you to a duel! Prove to me you deserve your title.
Ask_To_Duel.4: I challenge you to a duel! Prove to me you deserve your title.
Ask_To_Duel.5: I challenge you to a duel! Prove to me you deserve your title.

Accept Duel.1: I hope you're prepared to lose.
Accept Duel.2: Hahaha. You're confidence is indeed slightly amusing. However, I hope you know I will win.
Accept Duel.3: I haven't fought in a bit. I guess I could use a good warm up. I hope you're ready.
Accept Duel.4: Ah, it'll be fun to fight someone of your caliber.
Accept Duel.5: Sigh. I do not really want to fight you. But, do not think I will hold back simply because we are friends.

Confirm Duel.1: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.2: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.3: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.4: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.5: Let us get this duel started then.

Ask_To_Spar.1: It won't help me improve my abilities much, but I think we should spar.
Ask_To_Spar.2: I am looking for a sparring partner. Wanna spar?
Ask_To_Spar.3: I need some sparring practice. Would you consider sparring with me?
Ask_To_Spar.4: I would be grateful if you would spar with me.
Ask_To_Spar.5: I would be grateful if you would spar with me.

Accept Spar Request.1: I do not see how sparring against you will result in anything but your hurt ego.
Accept Spar Request.2: If you want to spar with me I hope that you are ready to lose.
Accept Spar Request.3: I suppose I could use some practice.
Accept Spar Request.4: A spar, huh? I suppose it really couldn't hurt to get some practice in with you.
Accept Spar Request.5: Sure, it'll be fun to face such a worthy opponent.

Confirm Spar.1: Well. That's too bad. Maybe some other time then.
Confirm Spar.2: Well. That's too bad. Maybe some other time then.
Confirm Spar.3: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.4: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.5: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.

Bribe.1: I cannot believe I am asking you of all people, but would you accept this.
Bribe.2: Would you be interested in this gift.
Bribe.3: I decided to get this for you, hopefully you'll accept it.
Bribe.4: I decided to get this for you, hopefully you'll accept it.
Bribe.5: I decided to get this for you, hopefully you'll accept it.

Accept Bribe.1: Do you honesly think I would stoop to your level and accept a bribe.
Accept Bribe.2: I hope you think better of me than to think I would be swayed so easily by a bribe.
Accept Bribe.3: I do not usually accept bribes, but I suppose I could make an exception for you.
Accept Bribe.4: I do not usually accept bribes, but I suppose I could make an exception for you.
Accept Bribe.5: I do not usually accept bribes, but I suppose I could make an exception for you.

Ask_To_Join_Party.1: Would you be willing to allow me to join you?
Ask_To_Join_Party.2: I would greatly appreciate if you would allow me to stand by your side.
Ask_To_Join_Party.3: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.4: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.5: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.

Accept Into Party.1: I am not sure I am ready to accept more party members at this time.
Accept Into Party.2: You seem like a smart and capable person. You are in.
Accept Into Party.3: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.
Accept Into Party.4: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.
Accept Into Party.5: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.

Recruit_For_Party.1: Would you like to join my party?
Recruit_For_Party.2: My party could use a mind like yours. Would you care to join?
Recruit_For_Party.3: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.4: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.5: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.

Join Party.1: I will consider your offer, but I cannot say at the moment.
Join Party.2: I appreciate the offer and I gladly accept.
Join Party.3: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.
Join Party.4: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.
Join Party.5: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.

Compliment.1: I can tell that you have many great qualities.
Compliment.2: I belive that you are a strong and wise individual.
Compliment.3: I can tell that you have many great qualities.
Compliment.4: I am glad to have met you. I truly believe knowing you has had a positive effect on me and this village.
Compliment.5: I am glad to have met you. I truly believe knowing you has had a positive effect on me and this village.

Thank.1: That would actually be flattering if it wasn't coming from you.
Thank.4: It is not often people flatter me.
Thank.5: Thanks so much, and I could say the same about you.

Grovel.1: I am reluctant to do this, but I suppose I must beg for your mercy.
Grovel.2: Please know that I truly meant no harm to you and accept my apology.
Grovel.3: My friend, please know that I would never try to harm you. I truly meant no real harm.
Grovel.4: My friend, please know that I would never try to harm you. I truly meant no real harm.
Grovel.5: My friend, please know that I would never try to harm you. I truly meant no real harm.

Accept Plea.1: Oh please get off your knees you're making an absolute fool of yourself.
Accept Plea.2: *Sigh* I suppose I can overlook your actions this one time.
Accept Plea.4: Please, get off of your knees you do not need to go that far simply to apolgize to me.
Accept Plea.5: My friend I would accept an apology from you anytime.

Advise To Train With.1: I belive that your village would be safer if you trained its troops with HERO
Advise To Train With.2: I think that it should be a high priority for you to train with HERO
Advise To Train With.3: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO
Advise To Train With.4: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO
Advise To Train With.5: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO

Take Advice To Train With.1: HERO!? Train me? I believe I know when I should train the village and its soldiers. I do not need your advice.
Take Advice To Train With.2: HERO!? Train me? Are you implying that this village is weak? I think I know how strong they are more than you do.
Take Advice To Train With.3: HERO? Train me? Hmm. It cannot hurt to always be a bit more prepared. I will consider it.
Take Advice To Train With.4: HERO? Train me? I do worry about whether we are prepared for an attack or not. I will definitely consider training.
Take Advice To Train With.5: HERO? Train me? I know you're right. This village is vunerable in its current state. I will definitely think about training in order to bolster our defenses.

Advise To Fight.1: Please hear me out. I think fighting HERO would be in your best interest.
Advise To Fight.2: I have some advice that you may find useful. You may want to consider fighting HERO.
Advise To Fight.3: If there is one thing that I know it's that alot can be learned from a good fight. You should try fighting HERO.
Advise To Fight.4: If there is one thing that I know it's that alot can be learned from a good fight. You should try fighting HERO.
Advise To Fight.5: If there is one thing that I know it's that alot can be learned from a good fight. You should try fighting HERO.

Take Advice To Fight.1: A fight huh. I'll do it. I am always up for a fight.
Take Advice To Fight.2: A fight huh. I'll do it. I am always up for a fight.
Take Advice To Fight.3: A fight huh. I'll do it. I am always up for a fight.
Take Advice To Fight.4: A fight huh. I'll do it. I am always up for a fight.
Take Advice To Fight.5: A fight huh. I'll do it. I am always up for a fight.

Advise To Send Peace Offering To.2: You should send a peace offering to HERO in order to earn their favor.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.3: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.4: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.5: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.

Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.1: Peace huh. Sounds attractive. I'm in. I'll do it.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.2: Peace huh. Sounds attractive. I'm in. I'll do it.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.3: Peace huh. Sounds attractive. I'm in. I'll do it.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.4: Peace huh. Sounds attractive. I'm in. I'll do it.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.5: Peace huh. Sounds attractive. I'm in. I'll do it.

Request_Teaching.1: Would you please teach me one of your skills so that I can be better prepared for the challenges to come?
Request_Teaching.2: Would you please teach me one of your skills so that I can be better prepared for the challenges to come?
Request_Teaching.3: Would you please teach me one of your skills so that I can be better prepared for the challenges to come?
Request_Teaching.4: Would you please teach me one of your skills so that I can be better prepared for the challenges to come?
Request_Teaching.5: Would you please teach me one of your skills so that I can be better prepared for the challenges to come?

Teach.1: I would rather burn this village to the ground with my own hands than teach someone like you.
Teach.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt.
Teach.4: Of course I would be fine teaching you.
Teach.5: I would love to teach you. I can probably learn some things myself by teaching you.

Confirm Teach.1: I really wanted to learn from you, but I guess I will give up for now then.
Confirm Teach.2: I really wanted to learn from you, but I guess I will give up for now then.
Confirm Teach.3: I really wanted to learn from you, but I guess I will give up for now then.
Confirm Teach.4: I really wanted to learn from you, but I guess I will give up for now then.
Confirm Teach.5: I really wanted to learn from you, but I guess I will give up for now then.

Offer_Teaching.1: I wouldn't mind imparting some of my knowledge upon you if you are alright with it.
Offer_Teaching.2: I believe I could teach you many things that would be of use to you.
Offer_Teaching.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt.
Offer_Teaching.4: Please allow me to teach you. It would be mutually beneficial.
Offer_Teaching.5: I would love to teach you. I can probably learn some things myself by teaching you.

Accept Teaching.1: Hahaha I honestly would rather be taught by a rat than the likes of you.
Accept Teaching.2: I doubt you could teach me anything.
Accept Teaching.3: Oh, I suppose being taught by you could not hurt.
Accept Teaching.4: I would be more than happy to accept your teaching.
Accept Teaching.5: I gladly accept your offer. I would love to be taught by someone like you.

Boast.1: I am the epitome of strength!
Boast.2: I once took down several bandits unarmed.
Boast.3: If you're ever in need of any extra fighting strength, my skill with a blade is peerless
Boast.4: If you're ever in need of any extra fighting strength, my skill with a blade is peerless
Boast.5: If you're ever in need of any extra fighting strength, my skill with a blade is peerless

Congratulate.2: I am sure you are talking yourself up.
Congratulate.5: I already knew you were great, but not that great.

Intimidate.1: I am absolutely sick of you. If someone doesn't take you out soon I just might do it myself.
Intimidate.2: You seem good at making enemies, so if I were you I would watch my back.
Intimidate.3: You seem good at making enemies, so if I were you I would watch my back.
Intimidate.4: You seem good at making enemies, so if I were you I would watch my back.
Intimidate.5: You seem good at making enemies, so if I were you I would watch my back.

Talk Back.1: Were you trying to scare me, because all you did is make me angry.
Talk Back.2: You better choose your future words very carefully.
Talk Back.3: Ah... I do not know if I offended you, but if you are mad at me just please leave the village out of it.
Talk Back.4: Have I done somehting to you? I thought we were on good terms.
Talk Back.5: My friend I do not know if I have done anything to make you say that but I am truly sorry if I have.

Insult.1: Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries.
Insult.2: The fact that you even think you can call yourself a 'Hero' is an absolute joke.
Insult.3: The fact that you even think you can call yourself a 'Hero' is an absolute joke.
Insult.4: The fact that you even think you can call yourself a 'Hero' is an absolute joke.
Insult.5: The fact that you even think you can call yourself a 'Hero' is an absolute joke.

Defend Self.1: Is that really the best insult you have? Pssh, pathetic.
Defend Self.2: I hope you know that you are playing with fire right now.
Defend Self.3: Oh... that was a pretty awful thing to say.
Defend Self.4: That actually stung quite a bit.
Defend Self.5: What did I do to you to deserve that? I thought we were closer than that.

Already_Asked.1: You are quite the joker. Remember, you have already asked me that.
Already_Asked.2: You are quite the joker. Remember, you have already asked me that.
Already_Asked.3: You are quite the joker. Remember, you have already asked me that.
Already_Asked.4: You are quite the joker. Remember, you have already asked me that.
Already_Asked.5: You are quite the joker. Remember, you have already asked me that.

Ask_For_Quest.1: Is there anything I can do to make your life easier?
Ask_For_Quest.2: Is there anything I can do to make your life easier?
Ask_For_Quest.3: Is there anything I can do to make your life easier?
Ask_For_Quest.4: Is there anything I can do to make your life easier?
Ask_For_Quest.5: Is there anything I can do to make your life easier?

Decline_To_Answer.1: I have nothing to say to that.
Decline_To_Answer.2: I don't know you well enough to reply.
Decline_To_Answer.4: Sorry, but I do not know how I should respond.
Decline_To_Answer.5: Sorry, but I do not know how I should respond.

give_quest_hack.1: Wait, don't leave just yet! There is a rogue squadron of rebels north of here. Would you help me protect my people from them
give_quest_hack.2: Wait, don't leave just yet! There is a rogue squadron of rebels north of here. Would you help me protect my people from them
give_quest_hack.3: Wait, don't leave just yet! There is a rogue squadron of rebels north of here. Would you help me protect my people from them
